_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: LumenVM
author: unknown@unknown.com
startup: #Thanks for using LumenVM (but better and free)

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

apt update && apt install -y wget curl gzip

TARGET_DIR="/mnt/server"
mkdir -p "$TARGET_DIR"
cd "$TARGET_DIR"

IMAGE_URL="https://github.com/ma4z-sys/LumenVM/releases/download/ubuntu-22/ubuntu-22.qcow2.gz"
OUTPUT_FILE="ubuntu-22.qcow2"

echo -e "\nDownloading and extracting Ubuntu 22 image..."
wget -qO- "$IMAGE_URL" | gunzip > "$OUTPUT_FILE"

if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
    echo -e "\nDownload and extraction completed successfully."
else
    echo -e "\nFailed to download or extract the image."
    exit 1
fi
